channel.title: Special attacks

anyone know how to fix this error? plz tel me

item.title: Special attacks
item.dc:creator: @propabad propabad
item.description:
@propabad wrote:

open client.java search public class client extends Player implements Runnable { add this under it [code]public void DragonLongSpecial(){
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1305) {
if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 0)
if (spec >= 3) {
hitDiff = 24;
inCombat();
staticAnimation(248, absX, absY, 100);
setAnimation(1058);
actionTimer = 25;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
spec -= 3; // Specs
}
else {
sendMessage(“You need more special energy to do that.”); // Specs
}
} else {
sendMessage(“You Are Not Weilding A Dragon Long”);
}

}
public void DragonBattleAxe(){
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1377){
boolean GoOn = true;
if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 0)
if (spec >= 9) {
setAnimation(1670);
staticAnimation(246, absX, absY-1, 100);
strPot = true;
strPotTimer = 90;
abc = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]);
cba = abc / 10;
abc2 = cba * 2;
if (abc2 <= 1) {
abc2 = 2;
}
playerLevel[2] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]);
playerLevel[2] += abc2;
sendFrame126(""+playerLevel[2]+"", 4006);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
GoOn = false;
spec -= 9;
}
else {
sendMessage(“You need more special energy to do that.”); // Specs
}
} else {
sendMessage(“You Are Not Weilding A D-B-Axe”);
}

}

public void DragonDagger(){
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1215 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698) {
if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 0)
if (spec >= 2) {
hitDiff = 12;
inCombat();
staticAnimation(252, absX, absY, 100);
setAnimation(1068);
actionTimer = 25;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
spec -= 2; // Specs
}
else {
sendMessage(“You need more special energy to do that.”); // Specs
}
} else {
sendMessage(“You Are Not Weilding A Dragon Dagger”);
}

}
public void DragonMace(){
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1434) {
if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 0)
if (spec >= 3) {
hitDiff = 30;
inCombat();
staticAnimation(251, absX, absY, 100);
setAnimation(1060);
actionTimer = 25;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
spec -= 3; // Specs
}
else {
sendMessage(“You need more special energy to do that.”); // Specs
}
} else {
sendMessage(“You Are Not Weilding A Dragon Mace”);
}

}
public void DragonHally(){
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 3204) {
if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 0)
if (spec >= 3) {
hitDiff = 30;
inCombat();
staticAnimation(282, absX, absY, 100);
setAnimation(440);
actionTimer = 25;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
spec -= 3; // Specs
}
else {
sendMessage(“You need more special energy to do that.”); // Specs
}
} else {
sendMessage(“You Are Not Weilding A Dragon Halberd”);
}

}
public void DragonScimmy(){
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4587) {
if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 0)
if (spec >= 10) {
hitDiff = 100;
inCombat();
staticAnimation(347, absX, absY, 100);
setAnimation(451);
actionTimer = 25;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
spec -= 10; // Specs - By Sam Server
}
else {
sendMessage(“You need more special energy to do that.”); // Specs
}
} else {
sendMessage(“You Are Not Weilding A Dragon Scimmy”);
}

}
public void WhipSpecial(){
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151) {
if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 0)
if (spec >= 3) {
hitDiff = 24;
inCombat();
staticAnimation(341, absX, absY-1, 100);
setAnimation(1658);
actionTimer = 25;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
spec -= 3; // Specs - By Sam Server
}
else {
sendMessage(“You need more special energy to do that.”); // Specs
}
} else {
sendMessage(“You Are Not Weilding A Whip”);
}

}
public void checkSpec() { // specs - by Danie B
if (spec == 0)
{
specbar = “@red@[–SPECIALATTACK–]”;
}
if (spec == 1)
{
specbar = “@gre@[@red@–SPECIALATTACKS–]”;
}
if (spec == 2)
{
specbar = “@gre@[-@red@-SPECIALATTACKS–]”;
}
if (spec == 3)
{
specbar = “@gre@[–@red@SPECIALATTACKS–]”;
}
if (spec == 4)
{
specbar = “@gre@[–S@red@PECIALATTACKS–]”;
}
if (spec == 5)
{
specbar = “@gre@[–SP@red@ECIALATTACKS–]”;
}
if (spec == 6)
{
specbar = “@gre@[–SPE@red@CIALATTACKS–]”;
}
if (spec == 7)
{
specbar = “@gre@[–SPEC@red@IALATTACKS–]”;
}
if (spec == 8)
{
specbar = “@gre@[–SPECI@red@ALATTACKS–]”;
}
if (spec == 9)
{
specbar = “@gre@[–SPECIA@red@LATTACKS–]”;
}
if (spec == 10)
{
specbar = “@gre@[–SPECIAL@red@ATTACKS–]”;
}
if (spec == 11)
{
specbar = “@gre@[–SPECIALA@red@TTACKS–]”;
}
if (spec == 12)
{
specbar = “@gre@[–SPECIALAT@red@TACKS–]”;
}
if (spec == 13)
{
specbar = “@gre@[–SPECIALATT@red@ACKS–]”;
}
if (spec == 14)
{
specbar = “@gre@[–SPECIALATTA@red@CKS–]”;
}
if (spec == 15)
{
specbar = “@gre@[–SPECIALATTAC@red@KS–]”;
}
if (spec == 16)
{
specbar = “@gre@[–SPECIALATTACK@red@S–]”;
}
if (spec == 17)
{
specbar = “@gre@[–SPECIALATTACKS@red@–]”;
}
if (spec == 18)
{
specbar = “@gre@[–SPECIALATTACKS-@red@-]”;
}
if (spec == 19)
{
specbar = “@gre@[–SPECIALATTACKS–@red@]”;
}
if (spec == 20)
{
specbar = “@gre@}[–SPECIALATTACKS–]”;
}

  } // specs[/code] then search [code]/*MISC STUFF*/[/code] under it add [code]public String specbar = "@gre@[--SPECIALATTACKS--]@gre@"; // specs 
public int spec = 20; // specs 
public int specTimer = 0; // specs[/code] after that search [code]public boolean process() {		// is being called regularily every 500ms[/code] add under it [code]sendQuest("@blu@ "+specBar,174); // specs - by Jorsa
	if (specTimer < 60) { // specs - by Jorsa
		specTimer += 1; // specs - by Jorsa
	}
	if (specTimer >= (60 - (playerLevel[playerMagic] / 2)) && spec < 10) { // specs - by Jorsa
		spec += 1; // specs - by Jorsa
		specTimer = 0; // specs - by Jorsa
	}
checkSpec();[/code] now search for case 163: and paste over from case 163: to case 52052: with this [code]case 163: // dbaxe spec
					sendQuest("db-axe", 173);
					DragonBattleAxe();
					break;
			        case 167: // d long
					sendQuest("DLong", 179);
					DragonLongSpecial();
					break;
			        case 172: // whip emote
					sendQuest("Whip", 187);

sendQuest(“Whip”, 181);

					WhipSpecial();
					break;
				
                                    case 166: // dance emote
					sendQuest("DScim", 178);
					DragonScimmy();
					break;
			        case 52050: // panic emote
					sendQuest("D dag", 13371);
					DragonDagger();
					break;
			        case 52051: // jig emote
					sendQuest("D mace", 13372);
					DragonMace();
					break;
			        case 52052: // spin emote
					sendQuest("DHally", 13373);
					DragonHally();
					break;[/code] then search [code]update();[/code] and add this under it [code]sendFrame126("DLong", 179);

sendFrame126(“Whip”, 187);
sendFrame126(“D-Sc”, 176);
sendFrame126(“Dbax”, 173);
sendFrame126(“DMac”, 13372);
sendFrame126(“DHal”, 13373);
sendFrame126(“DDag”, 13371);[/code] now when u log on click on emotes ull see the specials.

Read full topic
